profile:
Imagine your home totally organized! At Closets by Design, we work to simplify your life by designing, building, and installing custom closets, garage cabinets, home offices, laundries, pantries, and much more. With a wide selection of finishes, accessories, and hardware, you will get the customized look you have always dreamed of and you can rely on our three decades of experience for total customer satisfaction. From our no obligation in-home consultation, custom tailored designs, and high quality product construction, we offer excellent value. For service in Toronto and Durham including Toronto Downtown, North York, Scarborough, Pickering, Ajax, Whitby, Oshawa, Uxbridge, Newcastle, Peterborough, and Bowmanville visit our website to book your free consultation today or visit our showroom in Toronto located at 667 Mount Pleasant Rd. or Scarborough 780 Birchmount Rd, Unit 8.    
Closets by Design: Quality, beauty, and commitment are built in!

profile:
At Garage Tailors we challenge the status quo in the home organization space, so that we can do our part to help make our clients day a little less stressful.  Our operating principles are trust, honesty, transparency and value.  The experience for our clients must be positive and one that they have to tell their friends about. 
Our philosophy is that every families garage transformation, whether it's solely a floor coating to a full renovation, be designed and constructed to be within an agreed upon budget and schedule, that is how we work with you. From the initial estimate to when we say thank you for your business, we believe that we can meet all your expectations.
We service the GTA and all the surrounding areas.

profile:
ClutterBGone is a full service company specializing in residential/home office organizing, de-cluttering, downsizing & life transition services, also providing packing and unpacking/settling in.  All services provided throughout the Greater Toronto Area.  fully insured and ClutterBGone is an active member of the Professional Organizers in Canada and the National Association of Professional Organizers.

Your Chaos. Our Solution. Your Peace of Mind.

At ClutterBGone we create positive, strong and lasting relationships. We’re honoured that our clients invite us to come into their homes and small businesses. That’s a huge leap of faith and we appreciate that trust.  We’ve worked hard to find and create solid partnerships with service providers in our industry that we can refer to and use for our clients with the utmost respect and integrity. Our clients are truly our # 1 priority.

profile:
DOWNSIZING
With patience and understanding, Ease Up Organizing helps you or your family members transition to smaller living spaces, while preserving familiarity and comfort. We work with you at a pace that is comfortable.
 
DECLUTTERING
With sensitivity, and without judgment, Ease Up Organizing will work with you to sort and declutter your possessions, ensuring you have the final say about every item. We will help you make decisions about what to keep, what to gift to family or friends, what to donate or throw away – taking the proper steps to donate or dispose of unwanted items in an environmentally responsible way. Once we have decluttered, we will help you organize, contain, and put away what you have chosen to keep.
 
ESTATE CLEARING
Ease Up Organizing offers Estate Clearing Services to families struggling with the emotional and physical effects of losing a loved one. So many decisions to make. So many responsibilities. We're here to help, from start to finish. 
 
Ease Up will prepare your home for sale. We sort items, furniture, and other treasures with your direction or without. We’ll earmark items to give away to family members, sell, donate, or recycle. 
 
We partner with a team of trusted professionals, including junk removal, contractors, gardeners, movers, auctioneers, real estate agents, and stagers. We have helped others with this burden during a time of grief and overwhelm. Call us. Learn how we’ve helped so many. 
 
MOVE MANAGEMENT and PUT AWAY ON MOVE IN DAY
Ease Up Organizing provides you with all the services you need for a streamlined move, including ensuring your current furniture and personal possessions will fit comfortably into your new home.
 
Just before move day, we arrive with boxes and materials, and carefully pack your treasured possessions. We coordinate with trusted movers to manage the move on the day, and once the move is complete, we help you unpack, remove packing materials, and make you comfortable in your new home.
 
We can also help you sort and declutter your items prior to moving day so that you are bringing with you only what you really need.
services: Organizing - Decluttering - Downsizing - Estate Clearing - Move Management
specialities: If you are embarrassed about clutter and disorganization, we assure you, we do not judge. Life happens and your disorganized state it is not a reflection of your worth or ability. We know that asking for help is a sign of strength. When we see your space, we see the potential in your future.
memberships: Professional Organizers in Canada & Better Business Bureau
name: Ease Up – The Organizing Experts

profile: Get Sorted is a non-judgmental professional decluttering and organizing service. As an enthusiastic professional organizing expert, Kelsey aims to help people release their limiting beliefs and emotions surrounding clutter. With a degree in social work and a background in visual arts, Get Sorted is the perfect blend of Kelsey’s strengths, and she is thrilled to bring the joy of uncluttered living to Toronto.
services:
THE GET SORTED EXPERIENCE -

COMPLIMENTARY CONSULTATION: The consultation includes a phone call. Brief Q&A, review of 'clutter stressors' and organization goals. Then, we book your session(s)! 


HOME DECLUTTERING AND ORGANIZING SESSIONS: I guide my clients through the process of decluttering and organizing their home in a way that they can easily maintain. In addition, shopping errands and donations delivery are included services upon booking sessions. 
I also provide emotional support to my clients when needed during their sessions.
payment_method: Cash, Interac e-transfer, Cheque, or Credit Card
memberships: Professional Organizers of Canada (POC), Ontario Association of Social Workers (OASW)
name: Get Sorted
